评论详情: I really like the 3 colors I ordered, the weave pattern and the fact that it's fully lined. Sadly, the XL was too big for my 5'9'', 180 lbs. pear-shaped frame. I wanted it to be more fitted over my button-down blouses to accentuate my slender waist. I decided to reorder it in the next size down. I'm pretty long waisted, so I was hoping it would be long enough in the L size. I think in the 3 colors I like, the vests will be fun layering pieces to add to my wardrobe, that is if the L fits correctly. I have lots of tops and blouses they I think will work great with. I'm going to change the buttons to black, but I'm pretty sure I have some on hand. UPDATE: after trying on the large (a size down from what I first ordered) it fit nicely, except the design was too short and the neckline too deep for my preference. I decided to return both sizes in all 3 colors. Besides the fit, none of the colors looked good with my skintone. Lastly, as 100% polyester, it wasn't very insulative. It's cold in cold weather and hot in warmer weather. I really wanted a classic style vest as a warm laying piece for the cold months, almost half the year here in SE Idaho. That's not what this vest design gave me, which was disappointing because I like the classic style.

For this price, I was not expecting much. Probably a flimsy little vest I can throw on in a pinch. This garment is lovely. True to size. So well maid. Heavy enough so that it hangs well. Beautifully lined. Slit pockets with an actual “metal “, (not plastic), belt attachment in the back. I am thrilled.
I didn't think of my boobs as "not big enough" as I wear a 38DD, but this vest has REALLY deep bust darts that make me feel that way when I wear it. Cute, but an enormous waist to bust ratio.

I got so many compliments when I wore this to nyfw! It feels high quality and looks expensive. It also gives a snatched waist shape with the adjustable strap in the back.This has been a new closet staple added to my wardrobe!

I honestly love the fabric, overall look, and quality. It does seem to run small to me, and when I cinched the back it puckered too much.  I ended up removing the back straps and moving them up 2 inches and it fit absolutely perfectly!  I think if you have a bigger chest the sizing will work but if your smaller chested and wear bigger sizes like I do you’ll need to size down.

Great quality material and it fits nice.  I am 5'4 158lbs and wear a size 8 however" I'm glad I chose the recommended size & got the size large. It is a little loose in the chest and shoulder area but still looks nice.

I bought a medium size vest, which should fit me as I am typically a size 8 or medium in tops (which often run big on me) and I have a 29" waist. I have many similar vests, but unfortunately, the medium in this brand was too small. I couldn't button it up, as it was about three inches too small to close, the buttons fall below the breasts, vest in medium seems closer to a size 4 or jr 5/6. Very disappointed with the sizing.  NO STRETCH!  Gave it one star for the color is as described, Black white gingham.

Absolutely thrilled with my new plaid vest! It’s the perfect blend of cozy and chic. The pattern is adorable and versatile, making it easy to pair with both casual and slightly dressier outfits. The fabric feels soft yet durable, providing just the right amount of warmth without being too bulky. I love how the fit is flattering—structured enough to look polished but still comfortable for all-day wear. Plus, the quality is evident in the little details, like the neat stitching and sturdy buttons. I’ve received so many compliments already and can’t wait to wear it through the seasons. Highly recommend this vest to anyone looking to add a stylish touch to their wardrobe!

评论概述: Decent, but doesn't lay very well
评论详情: I'm 5', 120lbs and got a size S. I usually wear S/XS. I would recommend going on the lower end of your size range, especially if you have a smaller chest. I tightened this a lot, but there's a lot of gaping in the chest. The button holes and buttons don't have the same spacing so the fabric won't lay smooth in that area. However, the color was very accurate and I still think it's super cute. Overall, it is about the quality I expected for the price (not great) so I am happy. Definitely worth it imo for a cute little piece  Pros: Very cute, love the styling and pattern. Accurate colors Decent quality, especially for the price.  Pockets are real  Cons: Runs large  Lots of extra space and gaping at the top, especially if you have a smaller chest.  Buttons and button holes don't have the same spacing so there are bumps between them matter what.

Ordered an XXL received an XL. Size chart chart shows I would need a XL but like room which is why I sized up. Super cute vest, it fits but it’s more fitted and I like to have some room. I don’t want to sit in a chair and have to suck-in my stomach to prevent a bulging truffle shuffle belly pushing buttons apart. I’m going to keep it as I’m trying to lose some weight, but a little bummed I have to wait to wear it comfortably (I don’t want to deal with the hassle to return. such a pain to have to box it, print label, find location to drop. I always forget and it goes past the 30 day window). Bring back the easy Kohls returns process; drop and go!

Love this vest! Soft fabric and very feminine, especially the back. Ordered L (38B) and was able to button all the buttons comfortably.  It fit a bit big in the chest area. I may have been able to wear a M, but sizing chart suggested L. I'm ordering more colors. I like this brand too. Clothes are well made and fit well.

I've ordered other items from this designer before and they fit well and look nice. That being said, I had to return this vest because the darting in the chest was in a weird spot and the seams on the chest were awkward and lumpy. There was a lot of gapping at the side of the breasts/under the arms. Maybe on a bustier woman, this might not have been a problem. For reference; I am 34c and got a medium, which was the recommended size according to the chart.

The vest has no stretch to the fabric. Although the size medium fitting is almost perfect with the cincher strap (38 chest/30 waist, 130 lbs, size 5), the sewing is irregular and lumpy. Just barely filled out the top of the Medium with 34H, so can handle larger on top and lots of extra room at waist. A smaller size could work if the fabric stretched, but not the case. It has cute working pockets ok for cash and small items. I'm returning due to discomfort of material (which is decent quality for other purposes) and it would need constant readjusting with movement. For the price it could be more wearable.

评论详情: The large was probably the best fit available for me postpartum.  I'm roughly a C/D-cup and I'll say that there was more space than expected in the bust area even with a push-up bra, so be mindful of that if you have my previous size of boobs, A/B-cup.  The bust is not adjustable, but there is a waist-cinching thing to tighten it up around the midriff.  You may need to fill up the bust area with a lot of additional padding.  Not sure if that applies to the smaller sizes.  I bought large because I still have a big belly from my pregnancy two months ago.  Usually I'd go for medium and probably will if I can manage to get this belly off of me.  It's a very nice product overall.
